attributes.action: allow the people of the UK to have a say on Europe. Now that the EU Treaty has been approved and put in place we recognise that the referendum should be if the UK stays in the EU or not.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that EU treaty has been approved and the people of the UK did not have a say in this we feel that we as a nation need to have a say on how we move forward one way or another. This is a long standing topic and discussion that needs to be resolved. How can the people of today live by a decission 34 Yrs ago. Things have moved on.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
